events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to your experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application and will be reaching out to guide you through the process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, where we discussed your background in software development and your technical skillset.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the next steps, particularly the technical interview and opportunities within the engineering team.
A technical interview has been scheduled for June 10th to further assess your coding skills and problem-solving abilities relevant to the engineering position.
You performed excellently in the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering principles and devops practices.
We have scheduled your HR interview for June 15th to discuss cultural fit, compensation expectations, and further details about the company.
The HR interview went very well. You aligned with our core values and discussed your career aspirations clearly with the recruiting team.
An offer has been proposed for the software engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package tailored to your experience.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about the possibility of joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer to join as a software engineer, welcoming you aboard the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started successfully, including orientation sessions and setup of your development environment.
The hiring process is now complete. You are officially part of our engineering team, and we look forward to your contributions.
